A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite its pacing\, tonal and logical inconsistencies\, The Last Jedi does have something to say\, and commits fully to saying it: the line between the good guys and the bad isn't always as clear as a red and blue lightsaber. ...[(spoilers redacted\, see full review)]... Drawing the line between good and evil has never been so difficult in a Star Wars film. That is a very original thing in the Star Wars universe and the movie went all in to convey it - albeit at the expense of common sense\, character motivation and logical storytelling.\n\nFull review @ https://www.thepopcornempire.com/star-wars-the-last-jedi
